name: Iter Itineris
summary:
Ava Garde was a normal blonde girl until an incident with a mysterious, otherworldly monster. The creature snatched up Beatrice, her friend, and then mutated Ava into a halfling with red hair and green blood. The next day, she could not remember the events, but she did recall her friend being taken. A portal suddenly appeared inside her home. Without any other choice, she went inside and into the Externus, looking for her lost friend.

Iter Itineris is an English Yume Nikki fangame where you play as Ava Garde as you explore the unknown and bizarre realms of the Externus, the goal being to explore the worlds in the Externus and collect all the XenoVisions.
